rows.label: fev11_210_175_msg0001
rows.name: Well then, everyone, shall we go?

rows.label: fev11_210_175_msg0002
rows.name: Your Majesty...

rows.label: fev11_210_175_msg0003
rows.name:
Forgive me for overstepping my bounds,
Your Majesty, but are you certain
we shouldn't check that location first?

rows.label: fev11_210_175_msg0004
rows.name: Ah, that is certainly true, however...

rows.label: fev11_210_175_msg0005
rows.name:
Wadatsumi, you should consider
His Majesty's feelings.

rows.label: fev11_210_175_msg0006
rows.name:
He wants to catch up with Prince Adel.
It's been a long time since
they've seen each other.

rows.label: fev11_210_175_msg0007
rows.name: It's an honor to hear you say that.

rows.label: fev11_210_175_msg0008
rows.name:
What do you say, Hugo?
Would we be getting in the way
of your mission?

rows.label: fev11_210_175_msg0009
rows.name: No, not at all...

rows.label: fev11_210_175_msg0010
rows.name:
In fact,
I'd say you're all
involved parties here.

rows.label: fev11_210_175_msg0011
rows.name:
Since you are, after all,
traveling with a Heaven's Holy Grail.

rows.label: fev11_210_175_msg0012
rows.name:
In other words,
it's a mission involving Metsu?

rows.label: fev11_210_175_msg0013
rows.name: Exactly. Wadatsumi...

rows.label: fev11_210_175_msg0014
rows.name:
Yes, sir! By your imperial decree,
I will disclose the information.

rows.label: fev11_210_175_msg0015
rows.name: But we have another objective as well.

rows.label: fev11_210_175_msg0016
rows.name:
But at the same time, there is another
matter we are investigating.

rows.label: fev11_210_175_msg0017
rows.name:
So, Metsu.
Are you going to defeat,
or capture him?

rows.label: fev11_210_175_msg0018
rows.name: At the present time, neither.

rows.label: fev11_210_175_msg0019
rows.name:
It is His Majesty's will
that we first ascertain if this
Metsu is truly an enemy of the Empire.

rows.label: fev11_210_175_msg0020
rows.name: Did you get new intel?

rows.label: fev11_210_175_msg0021
rows.name:
After you left for Torigo,
we got a report from the 4th Squad.

rows.label: fev11_210_175_msg0022
rows.name:
They said they found a place
that looked like it had been
scorched by a massive power.

rows.label: fev11_210_175_msg0023
rows.name: That's something Adel can't ignore.

rows.label: fev11_210_175_msg0024
rows.name: I knew you'd understand.

rows.label: fev11_210_175_msg0025
rows.name:
Hugo, reminiscing over the Cloud Sea
is nice and all, but doing it out
in a green field is good too.

rows.label: fev11_210_175_msg0026
rows.name: Understood.

rows.label: fev11_210_175_msg0027
rows.name:
Then, let's make a little detour
before we head back to the flagship.

rows.label: fev11_210_175_msg0029
rows.name: It's fine. I've got Kasumi with me.

rows.label: fev11_210_175_msg0030
rows.name:
That's right.
Shin, take your time
and go with the others.

rows.label: fev11_210_175_msg0031
rows.name: All right.

rows.label: fev11_210_175_msg0032
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ]It's probably for the best
if Laura doesn't have to see
a place burned by Metsu...

rows.label: fev11_210_175_msg0033
rows.name:
I want to leave an offering
at the grave, so I'll wait
here in the village.
